MESSAGES.ENTRY:
Welcome to Zero Day PESU ECC!
New members are required to sign the contract given below.
For info on how to add digital signatures, check the mp4 video guide.
Upload your signed PDF to this [form]( ).
MESSAGES.HELP:
Hello there!
This is Zero Day PESU ECC's very own discord bot!
MESSAGES.SOCIALS:
Hello from Zero Day PESU ECC!
You can follow us on our social media handles using the buttons below :)

CREATE.MESSAGE: Here is the format for the command.
CREATE.NAME: createFormat.jpg

CREATE.MESSAGE:
Here is an example to create a challenge.
**Make sure you are using slash commands and not sending a message directly in the channel!**
CREATE.NAME: createExample.jpg

CREATE.MESSAGE: When a challenge is successfully registered, you should recieve a message of the below format.
CREATE.NAME: createSuccess.jpg

DELETE.MESSAGE: Here is the format for the command.
DELETE.NAME: deleteFormat.jpg

DELETE.MESSAGE:
Here is an example to delete a challenge.
**Make sure you are using slash commands and not sending a message directly in the channel!**
DELETE.NAME: deleteExample.jpg

DELETE.MESSAGE: When a challenge is successfully deleted, you should recieve a message of the below format.
DELETE.NAME: deleteSuccess.jpg

SUBMIT.MESSAGE: Here is the format for the command.
SUBMIT.NAME: submitFormat.jpg

SUBMIT.MESSAGE:
Here is an example to submit a flag.
**Make sure you are using slash commands and not sending a message directly in the channel!**
SUBMIT.NAME: submitExample.jpg

SUBMIT.MESSAGE:
On submitting a flag, if it is valid, it results in the below message.
Only you will be able to see this message!
SUBMIT.NAME: submitSuccess.jpg
